name: Patch
description:
Prototype for a project I'm working on. 

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • E - interact
  • Esc - exit panel view
  • mouse1 - interact with unconnected points on the panel (grey peg)
  • mouse2 - canecl current selection(purple peg) / break connection (yellow peg)
  • Backspace - quit
